content: प्रवाहः {@--1@} Flowing or streaming forth. {@--2@} A stream, course, current; प्रवाहस्ते वारां श्रियमयमपारां दिशतु नः <ls>G. L. 2</ls>; <ls>R. 5. 46</ls>; <ls n="R.">13. 10</ls>, <ls n="R. 13.">48</ls>; <ls>Ku. 1. 54</ls>; <ls>Me. 46.</ls> {@--3@} Flow, running water. {@--4@} Continuous flow, unbroken succession, continuity. {@--5@} Course of events (rolling onward like a stream). {@--6@} Activity, active occupation. {@--7@} A pond, lake. {@--8@} Course or direction towards. {@--9@} An excellent horse. (प्रवाहेमूत्रितं) means (<ab>lit.</ab>) making water in a stream; (<ab>fig.</ab>) doing a useless action.
